channel.title: Comments on: Touristr Beta – travel2.0 done right

item.title: By: Launch Count Down
item.dc:creator: Launch Count Down
item.description: [...] as we're close to release our Beta (1st of June) and the response was fantastic. Thanks to Conor, Fergus, James and Robin for their comments and referrals. 800 users came along and tested the site, and [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] as we’re close to release our Beta (1st of June) and the response was fantastic. Thanks to Conor, Fergus, James and Robin for their comments and referrals. 800 users came along and tested the site, and [...]

item.title: By: Jan Blanchard
item.dc:creator: Jan Blanchard
item.description: We're getting in our final count down before our official opening, early June at Copenhagen. Thank you to everyone who tested the site for their feedback and encouragements. We still have lots to do but we're getting closer. There will also be a cool announcement for the launch.
item.content:encoded: We’re getting in our final count down before our official opening, early June at Copenhagen. Thank you to everyone who tested the site for their feedback and encouragements. We still have lots to do but we’re getting closer. There will also be a cool announcement for the launch.
